official_title: To amend section 212 of the HOME Investment Partnerships Act to authorize participating jurisdictions to use assistance under such Act for administrative costs.

summary.text: Amends the HOME Investment Partnerships Act to permit participating jurisdictions to use up to ten percent of assistance under the Act for administrative costs.

titles.title: To amend section 212 of the HOME Investment Partnerships Act to authorize participating jurisdictions to use assistance under such Act for administrative costs.
